item.title: Enterprise SIP Trunking Consolidates Phone Lines
item.description: When was the last time you examined your telephone network? And I don’t mean just looking at your bills for excessive long-distance usage or disconnected lines. I’m talking about a thorough review of your phone system’s infrastructure and its connections. If you have multiple locations, you might unknowingly be tangled in a web of connections that drain your budget every month. This is especially common for companies that have expanded through acquisitions, where each site might have a completely different setup, leading to unnecessary expenses.
